message.body: Hi kennedy. This is clotilde. Im on my way to philly i should be there in 2h approximately. Let me know what your plans are so that we can meet up.
I'm at work until 3, and Jeremy is feeling sick. I'm going to stop on my way home and get him some stuff....do you have a lot of things? Is it possible to meet you later in the day?
Okay no problem. I only have a backpack so thats ok. We'll meet later.
Great, sorry bout that. Probably 6 ish will be good. Just come by the house then, if things change I'll let you know!
I'm going to a house party after work in west Philly if you wanna join!
Thanks! Not sure yet but ill let you know.
Ok, if you wanna come let me know before you leave, i have his scuba gear at home and need to return it!
I think i'll come with you to this house party. Where do i meet you?

Awesome! Ok; go to broad and spring garden. Take the subway southbound 2 stops to city hall. Free transfer to the trolley (green staircase at north end of platform). Take the 34 trolley and get off at 48th and call me!
Ok. Do u want me to take the stuff you need to return?
Oh yea, if you can find a snorkel on the coat rack bring it!
Sorry im already at the station. But jeremy just told me he might come so you should tell him to bring it.
My phone might die soon but ill be at 48th in a few minutes
Hey. I left quite early to enjoy this beautiful day. My bus is a 11.59pm tonight so i will probably see you after work. Have a good day.
Ok great! Hopefully I'll see you after work!
